Projects About Now

Long Story Short

Audio short story for ABC radio national.

2014

As the duo Transmit Recieve sound designer Adam Hunt and I were selected to present a piece of work from our performance art work, VOICE, on the nascent ABC podcast – Long Story Short – Australia’s version of “This American Life”.

Listen here:

The piece was a trimmed 5 minute narrative driven component of the work that was performed in one take by the delightful Penny Harpham. Where she recounts a visceral retelling on a time she found someone in a crashed car alongside a highway road in country Australia. It is incredible piece that Adam so skilfully edited and crafted sound wise.

Here is a link to the original show on the ABC website here: LINK
